And for another public service announcement. Jeff is a faggat and Laura is a dyke. I never get tired of hating them. I can see how their relationship works, though. Laura likes women, and Jeff is overly feminine. Jeff likes men, and Laura is overly butch. So therefore, they are attracted to each other because they have the traits that each one is looking for. It's a cross-homo relationship. It works like a normal relationship, each person likes the qualities in the other, and therefore they like each other. Except this is just reversed. Although, being homosexual they shouldn't be allowed existence anyway.. but hell. I think God just has a sense of humor.

Another theory is that they both want to look straight, so they pretend to be in some kind of relationship. It's like if you want to look like a good soccer player, you go into the game and look like you're doing something, whether you really are or not. Someone uninitiated to you would think "Well, there goes a nice soccer player" even though you really, really suck. This applies in that  since at first sight they don't always appear gay, you would think "oh well that's a nice couple" and don't even think about the fact they are, in truth, homosexual, and only using each other as a social crutch.

While we're on social crutches, now then...

I've noticed that a lot of people I know overly use things like sickness, betrayal, and other bad things that could happen to them as a social crutch. I've even seen some low self-esteem thrown in there, that isn't really that true. You can kinda tell when somebody's faking about not liking themselves. I don't like it when people use those kinds of things, and MOST of the time I try to point it out.

And on the case of saying "sorry" for no reason: It's gay. Just because you're talking and I'm not saying anything dosn't mean you have to say sorry. Or to anyone else for that matter. It makes you look weak, and when you look weak, regardless of what "shining" personality the person may have, they'll notice it, and start expecting it, thinking that they really are better than you, when in truth, they are the weaker person. 'Cept in my case. Appologizing too much just pisses me off.

Do you mortals out there like Puzzle-ee games? The one that I am working on for ZIG, called Falcon Sword Legend, is very nice. The castle has two floors. Before you say boring, it has a large fuckload of stuff to do. Some of these things you will have to take a break and come back to before you can realize what you must do. I have a firm belief that the story is intersting, although not in depth, it is still rather amusing. You are Jace, and you must "adventure" through a strange, old castle to find the Falcon Sword. The Falcon Sword grants any wish, but there is a rumor that it only grants eternal life. Anyway, to prove either side, you go to find it. On the first floor you must traverse the castle, opening doors and solving puzzles, when you find out about a "love story" of sorts between the princess of the castle and a soldier. When you go downstairs into the second level, you find another letter, this time it's the EXECUTION ORDER of the soldier that was in love with the princess. This triggers the event that when you go into the ballroom, you have to fight the demon spirit of a conglomerate between the princess and the soldier. Whoo. And then you get another puzzle item, and then you go and solve the puzzle, and find the sword. Whoo.

You know what's cool? The entire game is 5 boards. For any of you initiated to Megazeux or ZZT, you know what a board is. Well, in ZIG, boards get extremely large (my floors are 300x200), so I am able to put one floor/board. Why still 5 boards, then? Well duh. The title screen, introduction, and winning screen. Duh. Originally, you could get tired and hungry, both of which end your adventure, but those were taken out. I'm also thinking about taking out combat that's non-puzzle... But maybe not. I don't want your opinions, so don't bother posting. I won't read them.

the endless toil is to be my end. i start projects and never finish them. i begin conversations that serve no purpose. i do things only to undo them in the nearest future. my existence is pointless, nobody really would care if i were to suddenly dissapear or something. some people say "well i would care" but you are only saying this, there's nothing of substance in that sentence. nobody really does care about me because i never do anything. thus, i leave my resignation from internet privalages, and all of the communities i am involved in, until i have something to show for myself. for those of you who know where i live, you might as well not come, you will be met with the same rudeness as a vacuum cleaner salesman, which is probably what i will end up being should i continue on this mindless path. until i can live up to my name, i will not return to the internet. this could be a day, this could be a month, or even years. maybe infinity. if i am destined to never become something, then so be it. goodbye, people-who-know-my-name, goodbye.

Whoo. Seems that this render engine is a lot more simple than I most previously thought. Seems my meager geometry skills are proving to be quite adequete, as I have yet to need a reference. Seing as voxels are rendered in columns, there is no level-on-level in my engine, but I can fake it using the height built into using voxels. You see, to have a voxel is to have height, width, and depth. If a voxel is higher than another it creates a "Tier." By using objects that act as teleporters, or "elevators" you could create the illusion of another floor. Whoo. This is getting interesting.
As you can see, I got a different layout theme. Sorry for copying you, Liz, but this one is really a lot better than the one I had.

Let us talk of different things, of far away, of many unseen. Let us talk the talk of the lost. My mind is swirling very fast lately. My thought capability has suddenly ramped, and I feel smart again, like I did in elementary school. Recently an MZXer named Akwende posted about the ability to create and render a 3d voxel engine, like the one in doom or wolf3d. Hopefully, he goes through with it. But just in case, I have been studying Voxels, which are VOlumetric Pixels, and the ways they are used today. I came to the conclusion that Voxels when used alone in floating point numbers are extremely slow. So to speed this up, you must use Fixed-Point numbers. That increases speed a lot, but the engine all together is slow. Then I agree with Akwende, as he says that page flipping will increase the framerate by a large amount. I am tinkering with this idea.. I may have something soon. I just hope AK's voxel engine is faster than his Airship Voxel engine, which sucked big floppy donkey balls. My engine will be very nice, indeed. The first thing I will probably make with it would be a very nice fantasy first person shooter. Sorta like Enclave for the XBOX, just less prettier and dosn't have hit-sensitivity on the level Enclave does, where having 400 point armor means nothing when you are hit in the neck. Should be very interesting indeed. If you have ideas for it, feel free to comment. You might even get a nice spot in the credits.

I have decided, since A) My game ideas are lame, and B) I'll prolly never release one anyway, that I will create a magazine based on Reviewing, Previewing, and providing information to the community for Megazeux, a small text mode GCS based on the text mode GCS, ZZT. Yes, there are better GCSs to make for. But why Megazeux? Because it has a greater character than Verge, DarkBasic, and Div Games Studio. Their communities are only for getting help and learning about the system. Megazeux, and ZZT also have a community that basically does nothing. The occasional game in Megazeux, but most of the time it's people talking about what can and can't be done, and there's a lot of arguing, and it's easier to make friends with people and start up "companies." The problem is, is that in Megazeux, nobody is releasing that many games. Development is slow. The purpose of my magazine is to speed this up, by showing that people actually want the games being made. SO SAY YAY FOR DAVID KIDDIES.

I'm back. Yes, AGAIN. No, you can't get rid of me. I have decided to write a pencil and paper RPG for you right here right now. You may want to play this, or not. But it is cool and stuff. 

First you pick the homo or elite person you want to play!!

Jeff - Pacifist Feminine Male - Homo
Hp: 3
Attack: 0
Defense: 10
Intelligence: 0
Speed: 10

Laura - Butch Dyke - Homo
Hp: 5

Defense: 7
Intelligence: 3

Defense: 6
Intelligence: 4
Speed: 3

Defense: 8
Intelligence 7
Speed: 2

Justin - Fighting Ass Hole (gets critical asshit 50%) - Elite
Hp: 10
Attack: 9
Defense: 7

Speed: 3

Now, you learn to play.

To attack, you just subtract the opposition's defense from the attack number. Which means Liz and Jeff almost never hit for damage.

To defend, do the opposite, which means almost nobody here takes a whole lot of damage.

To use a "fagnique" or "magic" you add it's attack to intelligence and that's the attack damage. Then subtract the defense from it and bang.

Now, you pick your techniques. Pick 3

Homos must use Fagniques
Elites must use magic

Fagniques

Buttfuck - 1
DoubleAssFuck - 4
Asstongue - 9

Magics

ShadowWalker - Enemy dosn't hit for three turns
BitchSlap - 4
Youjustateshit - 19 (must have "shit" in possesion)

Now, you make your quest. For your first time playing, why don't you use this quest module below:

"DamN"

In "DamN" your team must go to jeff and laura's houses and kill them in their parents. Even if they are on your team. Why? Of course you can figure this one out. But, along the way you must fight Liz's Mom, and the DarkrMention. "Shit" is very common in this one, as are the monsters "Gaywad" and "FudgePacker". Both have 20 hp and zero stats.

Liz's Mom has 50 hp and 7 attack.
and the jeff and laura types, parents included are same as above listed.

Have fun, and you can't tell your parents, certain people, because this is opinion and opinion cannot be prosecuted.

Damnit damnit damnit I need to update this thing more. I've been gone way to long and now "I'm baaack agaaiiiinnnn." I vill hurt uu like yuu ave neever benst hurt befoooreee. I like to have people think that I'm their friend. It makes me laugh. I was reading my friend's journal. S'funny. She likes to make fun of this one person that I spent a full year in school picking on and beating on. He makes it too easy though. He needs to fight back, but he's kinda feminine which goes against the fighting back thing. You can't fight without changing personality to suit. So, if you're a pacifist feminine male, you can't fight without suddenly become a pugnacious masculine male. If you think about, everything you do is like levelling up in a role playing game. (cough LAME cough)

Look at it this way. When you level up you pick the characteristics you want to enhance like this:

Level 1: pacifist feminine male

Attack: 2
Defense: 7
Intelligence: 4
Speed: 7

But see, if you take your points and add them to something else via the level up, it would change your type.

Level 2: pugnacious masculine male (5 points upgrade)
Attack: 7
Defense: 7
Intelligence: 4
Speed: 7

See? By adding your "points" to "Attack" you become stronger and more masculine. Therefore, if you are a 

Level 1: Butch Dyke, like this person's femal friend,
Attack: 7
Defense: 7
Intelligence: 3
Speed: 3

By adding your points to something else, you get

Level 2: Shapely Female
Attack: 7
Defense: 7
Intelligence 6
Speed: 5

But unfortunately, neither one of these people are changing their personality types any time soon. I wish they would, it's driving me insane. I hate fags and I hate dykes so therefore, I find both of them rather dislikeable.

But if you're ME

Level 98: Killer Southern Son of a Bitch
Attack: 50
Defense: 100
Intelligence 175
Speed: 100

and you level up like normal, you would get

Level 99: Kick Ass Killer Southern Son of a Bitch
Attack: 55
Defense: 100
Intelligence: 175
Speed: 100

And there you go. Me, in all of my 5'0" glory. Yes, I am single but I'm ugly so don't even bother.

I thought up a little more on the plot of Merklin. You play Merklin, a wizard who's always wanted to be like Merlin, the great one. But you never could because you kept fucking up every single one of your spells (you've even turned the princess into a boar, twice). And that pissed the king off. So he exiled you. And 4 years later you cracked. And then you got drunk. A crazy drunk wizard with the power to turn you into a boar is NOT a good thing. So now you must go forth in the kingdom of CheezewizZ and DESTROY that BASTARD Merlin. Fun, 'eh?

Well, along the way you learn more spells. These range from remembering how to turn people into boars all the way to causing torrential rains of cow cushions (cow patties, cow crap, cow shit, whatever you wanna call it). To use these spells, though, you must first charge your MAGICAL ABILITY up really far so you won't run out. Then, you must be DRUNK ENOUGH to understand HOW to do the spell. (it turns out merklin is a good wizard, when he's drunk) To get "drunker" you must collect the beer bottles on the levels. But you don't HAVE to. Nooo.. you could just run around and throw  the "Magic Boomer's Wang of Juztize and Poly-Ticks" And you also get this nifty pet Bobble Beeble later.. but we won't get into that JUST YET...
